entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
